Text: Outside the benchmark index, Scott Technology fell 1.6 percent to $2.49 after appointing Pacific Edge executive Kate Rankin as its new chief financial officer.
Cause: appointing Pacific Edge executive Kate Rankin as its new chief financial officer.
Effect: Outside the benchmark index, Scott Technology fell 1.6 percent to $2.49
